text: @ProfKarolSikora @PrisonPlanet What's happening Professor is critically ill people are being put into covid wards regardless if they have covid or not. Happened to my mum. Tested negative for coronavirus, diagnosed with heart failure in A&E then placed in covid ward, died 3 days later & covid on death cert.
